Sentence.value: The test is done in the operating room, usually during an arthroscopy or small incision.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: The [[test|C0039593]] is done in the [[operating room|C0029064]], usually during an arthroscopy or small incision.

Sentence.value: Tell your health care provider: - If you are pregnant - If you ever had a problem with anesthesia - If you have any drug allergies - If you have bleeding problems - What medications you are taking (including any herbal medicines and supplements)
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Tell your [[health care provider|C0018724]]: - If you are pregnant - If you ever had a problem with [[anesthesia|C0278134]] - If you have any drug allergies - If you have bleeding problems - What medications you are taking (including any herbal medicines and supplements)
